title: Create Instagram Content for Summer Campaign
description: Design and create 5 Instagram posts for our upcoming summer collection. Posts should highlight our new products while maintaining our brand aesthetics.

description: Create an honest review video featuring our winter collection. Highlight quality, style, and comfort of each piece while demonstrating how they can be styled.
